author: BrickbyBrickDFM
title: Above and Beyond Brickheadz
review:
One of the newer 2020 LEGO Brickheadz, the Monkey King LEGO set 40381 stands out for a number of reasons. The legendary Monkey King is the main character from the classic Chinese novel, in which he along with some of his closest comrades conquers evils and helps retrieve Buddhist sutras.

 

This set consists of 175 pieces, and has some exclusive pieces; including the new pearl gold 1×1 rounded eye tiles, gold lacquered pieces that are used for the shoulder pads and the ends of the staff, and the front printed shirt piece.The color scheme of this set blends together to provide a stunning royal look to the Monkey King. The yellow/orange outfit highlights the reddish brown head of the Monkey King.  As with all other Brickheadz, the playability is limited.  These sets are mostly for display.  

Overall, this set is a must-have for Brickheadz enthusiasts. I believe this set will become a classic one day.
